DOC.brief_summary: Non-randomized , single arm , multi-center , clinical trial evaluate Corio™ pimecrolimus-eluting stent reduce anti-platelet therapy patient de novo lesion native coronary artery .
DOC.brief_title: Reduced Anti-Platelet Therapy With Pimecrolimus Drug Eluting Stent ( RAPID )
DOC.detailed_description: The registry design evaluate 6-month in-stent late lumen loss patient receive Corio™ drug-eluting stent .
DOC.criteria: General Inclusion Criteria 1 . Eligible percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . 2 . Documented stable unstable angina pectoris 3 . Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) ≥25 % 4 . Acceptable candidate coronary artery bypass graft surgery ( CABG ) . 5 . Target Lesion < 25 mm length RVD 2.5 3.5 mm visually estimate stenosis > = 50 < 100 % . General Exclusion Criteria 1 . Known sensitivity pimecrolimus , polymer ( PLGA ) cobalt chromium . 2 . Planned treatment PCI device target vessel ( ) . 3 . MI within 72 hour prior index procedure 4 . The patient cardiogenic shock . 5 . Cerebrovascular Accident ( CVA ) within past 6 month . 6 . Acute chronic renal dysfunction 7 . Contraindication ASA clopidogrel . 8 . Thrombocytopenia 9 . Active gastrointestinal ( GI ) bleed within past 3 month . 10 . Any prior true anaphylactiod reaction contrast agent 11 . Patient currently take chronic systemic steroid therapy systemic immunosuppressant therapy topical pimecrolimus . 12 . Female childbearing potential . 13 . Life expectancy le 24 month due medical condition . 14 . Comorbid condition ( ) 15 . Currently participate another investigational drug device study
